pkgmetadata.longdescription: Combines 'data.table' and 'matrix' Classes // Provides two classes extending 'data.table' class. Simple 'tableList' class wraps 'data.table' and any additional structures together. More complex 'tableMatrix' class combines 'data.table' and 'matrix'. See http://github.com/InferenceTechnologies/tableMatrix for more information and examples.
